participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Organized and passionate about personal growth.
participant_1.background: I like to organize my home and surroundings to keep busy on the weekends. I am going to take a yoga class to stay in shape and work on my Swedish. I was feeling down about my smoking habit, so I took my dog to the park and we played fetch for a while. I like to dye my hair a bright shade of red. I love my girlfriend.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, always looking for ways to express myself.
participant_2.background: I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. I am a caring and giving person who uses my talents to help others. People say I have a cute laugh. I just moved from VA to PA. I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.

content.text: What is up?
I just moved to PA from VA!
Oh cool! I am from VA too. What brings you to PA?
I am planning to move to Australia someday, so I wanted to try living in different places on the East coast for a while first.
That sounds like a great adventure! How long have you been planning this?
I have been wanting to do this since I was in high school. I had a teacher who spent a year in Australia and she told me all about it. I have been saving up ever since.
That is really awesome! I am sure it will be an amazing experience for you.
Thanks! I am excited to get started!
What are your hobbies?
I love to listen to rock music, and I play guitar. I also like to go for walks and think about the lyrics of my favorite songs.
I love rock music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love the Foo Fighters, the Red Hot Chili Peppers, and the Killers.
Great choices! I love all of those bands too.
They are all so good!
I love the way the Foo Fighters use their guitars, and the Chili Peppers have some of the best basslines ever.
Right? They are both so talented.
I really like the Killers' lyrics. They are always so meaningful and thought-provoking.
I agree! They are one of the most poetic bands out there.
I love that we have such similar taste in music!
Me too! It is always nice to meet someone who gets it.
I agree!
Maybe we can go see a show together sometime.
That would be so much fun
